Description: Terra Sigillata wheel-made pottery sherd from a platter(?) with a fine glossy red slip. Fine light yellow pottery fabric.
Curator's comments: Imperial Roman red slip fine tableware sherd of Eastern Terra Sigillata A ware from Syria, platter form dated c. 20BC-100AD. Shape unidentified, but see Hayes 1985. May join 2011,5009.49. Hayes, J. W. 1985. Sigillate Orientali. In Encicliopedia dell 'arte antica, atlate della forme ceramica. II ceramica fine Romana nel bacio Mediterraneo (Tarlo ellenism eprimo imperio), pp. 1-96. Rome.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (IF.068) (Phase 3)
